popularityCurve.label: u s district judge john c coughenour said the u s department of agriculture did not conduct an appropriate environmental review before it opened 24 million acres of conserved land to haying and grazing but that a reversal would be unfair to farmers and ranchers counting on using that land

clusterList.phrase: u s district judge john c coughenour said the u s department of agriculture did not conduct an appropriate environmental review before it opened 24 million acres of conserved land to haying and grazing but that a reversal would be unfair to farmers and ranchers counting on using that land

the national wildlife foundation and its washington indiana south dakota arkansas louisiana and kansas chapters sought an injunction to stop the emergency haying and grazing program which was announced in may

with another court hearing over conservation reserve program land slated for thursday in seattle secretary of agriculture ed schafer has shifted away from suggestions earlier this month that a decision on whether to allow an early out of crp land was imminent
